item.title: Google Webmaster Tools - WordPress Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 9.2.Â Google Webmaster Tools In the previous section, we linked WordPress to Google Analytics to analyze the traffic. Earlier we also configured WordPress SEO for search engine optimization. While, these two tools greatly help us to optimize and analyze the site performance still there are many areas that are not covered by them. In this section, we use Google Webmaster Tools to analyze the site further. Google Webmaster Tools cover following aspects:
